original_title: Wrinkles of the City: La Havana
overview: In 2012, the french artist JR collaborates with Cuban-American artist Jose Parla in Cuba for the Havana Biennale. Through JR's pasting and Jose's painting they created murals to tell the stories of 25 senior citizens who have lived through the Cuban revolution.
title: Wrinkles of the City: La Havana
